name: BTD0
description:
This is a new take on the Bloons TD* series: with the release of BTD6 (which you should definitely play after this), I am reminded of a joke "leaked" screenshot from when it was announced, which I made in about 10 minutes in paint. Now it's a game.

Or, will be a game - I tried to fit it into a week for this half-year's "GAMES MADE QUICK???", because the scribbly rushed theme is rather apt. Delving headfirst into Unity for the first time is perhaps not something that fits into a week though, so it's just a prototype for now (press numbers to spawn bloons). Maybe I'll get back to it eventually.

*Bloons copyright to Ninja Kiwi, not me.
